item.description: Gorilla: a fine-tuned LLaMA model surpasses GPT-4 in generating accurate API calls by using Retriever Aware Training (RAT) to adapt to changing APIs and reduce hallucinations.

item.title: Interpreting the Weight Space of Customized Diffusion Models
